direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods set flags that request the server to change either the IP address or the port in the Binding Response.
The getter method can be used to verify the state set by the setter method in test cases.
Both getter methods retrieve flags that indicate whether the server should change the IP address or the port.
Both methods handle flag settings based on binary data, with similar control flows and exception handling.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the ChangeRequestAttribute object is required before setting flags.
Setting the changePortFlag may be required before or after setting the changeIpFlag depending on the test scenario.
The getter method can be used to verify the state set by the setter method in test assertions.
The encode method can be used to verify the binary representation of the attribute, including the flags set by setChangeIpFlag.
